item.title: DR Congo hospitals overwhelmed after Goma fighting - UN
item.description: At least 17 people have reportedly been killed and close to 400 wounded.

item.title: White House pauses federal grants and loans
item.description: Democrats warn the move could have "devastating consequences" on programmes that people across the US rely on.

item.title: DeepSeek a 'wake-up call' for US tech firms, Trump says
item.description: DeepSeek's claim that its model was made at a fraction of the cost of its rivals has rocked the AI industry.

item.title: Watch DeepSeek AI bot respond to question about China
item.description: The BBC tests out the tool to see what type of answers it can and will give.

item.title: BBC's AI correspondent explains why DeepSeek has caused shockwaves
item.description: The Chinese-based large language model is disrupting the AI industry and the stock market.
